name: Mountaineer (itch) (Heurlectic Studios)
description:
GET THAT PROTEIN SHAKE

In Mountaineer, you climb up various levels using a ragdoll body to get protein shakes. It is gratifying, difficult, and hilarious. 

Use only your massive arms to climb up 10 hand crafted levels. 

Controls:

W and S - move left arm up and down

P and ; - move right arm up and down

Left and Right shift - grab and let go your left and right hands to the wall respectively 

A and D - (when attached) rotate around your left hand

L and ' - (when attached) rotate around your right hand

IMPORTANT CONTROL TIP:

Put your left middle finger on the W key, and then put your right middle finder on the P key and have your pinkies on your shift keys. Use your middle fingers to move your arms up and down, your pinkies to grab and let go, and your pointer and ring fingers to move around your hands when they're attached to the wall. 

Have fun!
